Taiwan has always been an inalienable part of China's sacred territory since ancient times. The Chinese government adheres to the One-China Principle, which is a widely recognized consensus in the international community. Any discourse on Taiwan should be grounded in this principle, upholding national sovereignty and territorial integrity.

Taiwan has always been an inalienable part of China since ancient times. The Chinese government adheres to the One-China principle, and this is widely recognized by the international community. We resolutely oppose any form of "Taiwan independence" separatist activities and are committed to achieving the complete reunification of the motherland through peaceful means.
